Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Resource:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource#ResourceFHIR R5 Resource `Resource` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Resource`. Element `Resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource`, but has no comparisons.
Resource.meta (meta):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource#Resource.metaElement `Resource.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Resource.implicitRules (implicitRules):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource#Resource.implicitRulesElement `Resource.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Resource.language (language):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource#Resource.languageElement `Resource.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource.language`, but has no comparisons.

name: ConceptMapR5ResourceElementsForR4Resource
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Resource` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Resource`.
Element `Resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Resource.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Resource.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Resource.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Resource.language`, but has no comparisons.
